website_summaries.verdict: This non-electric model stands out for its simple installation and intuitive design.
pros: Installation fo this water-pressured model takes around 15 minutes
Includes a separate feminine and rear nozzle
Impressive nozzle pressure, which can easily be adjusted with a knob
cons: Some customers complained of fragile components, notably the lever

customer_reviews.title: It is refeshing and performs a very good cleansing. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you install with precise centering. After installation is complete, don't test it while kneeling and facing it😱. Although the water is cold, you get used to it. It is refeshing and performs a very good cleansing. Love it. These should be in all assisted living facilities to aid the elderly resident and the staff with an initial cleaning that will minimize the friction and skin irritation associated with numerous manual cleaning procedures. If you are caring for an elderly loved one who needs assistance with toileting, I would urge you to consider purchasing this item. You will still need to manually clean, but less contact and less use of materials.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Kvool

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for installation to a cold water tap.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to try out in my home in the foothills of the Cascade mountains. Our water comes directly out of the ground and it is cold. I installed the device and after some adjustments got it working just fine. The problem is that my water is too cold to use this item without a heater. I will remove it and take it with me to my home in South East Asia where the water is always warm out of the tap. I would not recommend this device for anyone using a cold water outlet. If you installed it to a warm water outlet, it would be delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Kunjae

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design and adjustments
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product!! Installed it today-in approximately 30 minutes. I have severe arthritis in both shoulders. Will have one replaced in march so thought I better make arrangements for anal hygiene. This device is perfect. Why aren't they standard on all toilets?? I would recommend this to anyone even if you aren't handicapped. The hardware to adapt it is for 1/2 inch pipe so the average plumbing at 3/8 requires a trip to the hardware store. Not expensive but if you order one check your plumbing and be prepared. Update. The plumbing attachments do NOT require a trip to the hardware store. There is an adapter that hooks to the bottom of the tank that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: monkota

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyed the Boss Bidet so much, I bought 2 more!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research on this type of product and kept coming back to the Boss Bidet. With the Boss Bidet getting very good reviews and the extended 2 year warranty, I decided to give it a try. You never know exactly what you might be getting based on product reviews, but I have to say I am extremely pleased with this purchase. I wasn't sure that I would be able to install this on my own without getting into trouble like past projects. To my amazement, the installation went quickly and smoothly. I love this product. It works as advertised. In fact I liked it so much, I bought 2 more for Christmas presents. Thanks Boss!
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t fit my toilet....
customer_reviews.text: Be aware that this product only seems to work on less expensive toilets that have seats that connect with 2 nylon bolts and nuts. If you have a higher end toilet (In my case an American Standard 2 piece DXV) where the seat connects by snapping on to two connector posts, I don’t believe you can mount this seat. I exchanged emails with their customer service folks and they recommended I call a plumber. I don’t think so......
customer_reviews.author: Michael N.

customer_reviews.title: Decent booty cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The little lever broke after a few months and one of the gaskets started leaking a little before that. Some of that may be on me, who knows. I will say that the company sent me some more gaskets for free, it just took a couple weeks. Overall, I would buy. I will also mention it was pretty easy to install, HOWEVER, I had to buy another toilet seat just so it would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Troy A.

customer_reviews.title: Terrific home bidet.
customer_reviews.text: The Boss Bidet is a great attachment to your toilet. The front and back settings function extremely well and you can control the water pressure jet by how much you raise the on handle. Feel very clean and fresh afterward and definitely not using as much toilet paper. White looks good even on beige toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Aussie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Where had this been all our lives??
customer_reviews.text: OMG. Why has it taken me so long to get this. This arrived fast and while my husband was at work I installed this, it took me around 20 minutes because I wanted to make sure I got it right and kept checking and double checking. But It was super easy to install, just take your time. After that, oh man. It’s the only toilet our family wants to use in this house. Why don’t more Americans get on board with the bidet?
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer número one

customer_reviews.title: Love this bidet, but. . . .
customer_reviews.text: Love this bidet. Don't know why I didn't order one earlier. However, sometimes when I am flushing out the water supply outlets, there is a leak underneath the control panel coming from the center small hole. Hasn't been an unacceptable problem yet - I can clean up a quarter-size puddle from the floor once in awhile. Should have contacted the company by now but haven't. I would purchase it again because I believe this to be a fixable problem. After writing the above review and after talking to Amazon, I have returned the bidet. Amazon was fantastic to work with! I plan to order this bidet again.
customer_reviews.author: WindRider

customer_reviews.title: Installs and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Waited until morning hours to install.... just in case there was a problem. Everything went well until I started to disconnect the water from the wall to the tank. Instead of a flexible connector, there was a ridgid connector which could not be bent to reach the adapter. A trip to the hardware store where I purchased a flexible connector and a small roll of plumbing tape. Once I replaced the rigid connector, everything fell into place. Turned the water valve on and everything worked as it should. It really was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: paperman

customer_reviews.title: Works great & really cleans you!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install..My husband is not at all handy and this was so easy for him to do..If he did it anyone can do it.. Absolutely love this product and sorry I never knew anything like this existed, I always thought you needed a separate commode. Had I known I would’ve bought this years ago. Well made & easy to use & works great! Would definitely buy again because now I couldn’t live without it..
customer_reviews.author: DSB327

customer_reviews.title: Just Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've often thought about getting a bidet. And when Toilet Paper shortages began, I got serious about it. And now that I've got one, it's hard to imagine ever not using one. It was a little startling at first but then became soothing. Afterwards I felt clean and refreshed. The only thing that might make it better would be if it had a hot water hookup. I'm not saying that the cold water is uncomfortable. It feels great. But warm water would likely feel better. I liked it so much, I purchased a second one for my guest bathroom. And feel the need to spread the word of its greatness.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Carle

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected based on reading the reviews. The main complaint was it was too hard of a flow but it's actually adjustable by how far you pull the handle up. Not great control but enough so that I have no issues with it. Would be an easy upgrade for the manufacture to make this more controllable I would think. Had no problem installing it on an oblong toilet with an oak seat. Took maybe 10 minutes counting getting the wrench and screw driver to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: great if you want a super high power water jet scouring your you-know-what
customer_reviews.text: The handle on this product is really tricky to calibrate the right amount of flow so you don't blast your bottom. It's either a trickle, or a blast. If I was buying this over again, I'd get one with a dial instead of the lever. Also, vendor included a coupon for a free travel bidet in the box, but when I submitted my request, they emailed me and told me I had to leave a five star review on Amazon. That was *not* mentioned on the coupon. When I called them out on it I received ZERO response.
customer_reviews.author: melange

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A LIFE SAVER
customer_reviews.text: The Boss Bidet Bold has already surpassed everything I hoped for. I have severe bone on bone arthritis in both shoulders so proper cleansing is EXTREMELY difficult. Plus I will soon have shoulder replacement surgery which will add to the difficulty during recovery. Enter Boss Bidet Bold. Pull the lever, beautiful cleansing water does its job and bingo you are crystal clean. I only wish I would have done this years ago. So if you are of a "mature" age like myself this is the answer to those painful and difficult toilet experiences. A must have product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: We considered a bidet for a while. I had never used one. My wife was familiar with them. So we ordered one. I chose the Boss Bidet Bold because others had liked it. I also wanted the higher quality plus metal hardware instead of plastic. The bidet was very easy to install. No leaks. My wife tried it first and said it was good. I tried it and was very pleasantly surprised. I fully recommend it. We have since bought a 2nd one. We may soon have 5 for both houses and the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Barclay's Review

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Well how does one ever live without this !!!! Its an amazing product so easy to hook up I must say one needs to be careful on the leaver though it can be rather touchey and you dont want all that pressure at one time . But it works awesome I am a 63 year old female and I hooked it up by my self in ten minutes . Well I have had this for a while now and this is an anser to prayers if you have a disability or just want to be clean all the time I love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Virginia B.

customer_reviews.title: May need a new toilet seat.
customer_reviews.text: I love my bidet. I had a friend install it. He didn’t read the instructions so there are pieces left over. It leaks because he didn’t read the instructions and I need to replace the toilet seat. I should have read all the reviews first. I would have been prepared. Great product for those that live in an apartment. Just buy a new seat and read all the instructions. All women should be using a bidet for hygiene during that time of the month. Cold but a necessary clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get a 2 year warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this July 1, 2018 for $69.99. As of March 2020. It has started leaking from the controls. I would recommend buying an extended warranty if possible. The items works great but starts leaking around the year and a half mark. It’s easy to install so getting a new replacement every couple years isn’t a big problem, more of an annoyance. Definitely not worth it with the standard 1 year warranty though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: attachment is very easy
customer_reviews.text: It took about 15-20 minutes to install. No issues. Very easy. I have noticed that if you turn on the water first, where they clean out themselves, it tends to dump the cold water in the pipes and then I switch over to front and or rear. More comfortable for my wife. Positioning is very important. I have to place my wife due to her dementia. But after a few tries, I have found the correct position. Used to I would just give her a shower but now, not so much. I should have bought this years ago.
customer_reviews.author: walter w. grigg

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic switch
customer_reviews.text: This works fine, it's had it for a couple of years now. There is a small amount of leakage from the controls. Unfortunately, the part that gets the most use is made of plastic barely a hair's width is size. This is on the switch that actually turns the water on and off. I'll try gluing it, but I'm not sure if this will work. What would people do without plastic? I'd kind of like to find out. I would have liked to give it more stars.
customer_reviews.author: DuckAru

customer_reviews.title: Had it for 2 days- so far so good
customer_reviews.text: My hiney goes into shock from the cold water but it works! It's a great way to conserve our most precious resource (toilet paper) and clean sasquatch butts. The water stream is so powerful I think this should also be considered a type of enema. Perhaps they should call this the Enterprise Bidet Enema because it sprays water where no water has gone before. ...actually that's not entirely true- there was this time I was water skiing in New Jersey and I fell on my butt and I swear half that lake went up my tailpipe. Drained out in the boat. Grossed everyone out.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Disanza

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are terrible
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are incomplete and waste time. It should be 15 minutes, but it can be 2 hrs after you figure out what they left out of the instructions. Instructions are incomplete on product use as well, but you can figure it out with trial and error. Warning: You must watch the installation video or you will waste time following the written "instructions". I saw this same complaint from others, but chose to ignore it. If you wan to install in 15 minutes, you MUST watch the install video. Come on Boss, you can do better! Seems to be a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Prothro

customer_reviews.title: Where has this been all my life????
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It leaves you with a “fresh out of the shower” clean feeling! I thought the cold water might be an issue, but I don’t mind it at all. Just beware when getting used to the settings. It will go full on stinging mode if you just turn it all the way on! Also, don’t do what I did and try to test it before you sit. Water shot straight across my bathroom and hit the opposite wall! Hubs was able to install it in about 15-20 minutes. Then we took turns listening outside the bathroom door for the reaction of the other during first use. It was very entertaining, to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: JB mom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product; just be sure you have the right hose to connect it.
customer_reviews.text: After having the bidet for about 2 months, I noticed that it started leaking from the bottom of the unit. There is a small square-ish hole. My husband checked it out, and confirmed that the connections were correct; there was something inside the unit itself that was loose. This is a bummer. I really like the bidet and like the company. Perhaps I wasn't gentle enough in installing it or it had a factory defect?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ease of installation depends...
customer_reviews.text: If your toilet is identical to what’s in the video, this may be easy to install. After purchasing new hardware for my existing bottom attached toilet seat, I concluded that a top screwed seat would be a better option. Using plumbers tape on each connection is mandatory yet omitted from the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: SSSChitown

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: The bidet was very easy to install. It works perfectly. Use the online video instructions and you can't go wrong. For the extra $10 upgrade to the BOLD version. The metal hoses and fixtures are well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Russ Palmeri

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! I had bought one of the more expensive units (Around $500) and it was junk on every level and in every way. I knew I wanted a bidet so I decided to get this inexpensive one to see how it worked out while I continued to research the more expensive units. Long story short, this thing is perfect in every way. It is and does everything like you would expect it to. No frustrations, no guesswork - It just gets the job done perfectly every single time.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Online Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This attachment is very easy to install and works great. It is so much cheaper than buying a new toilet or even than buying a new bidet toilet seat. This sits under your existing toilet seat, is not a bulky addition, and we wonder why we didn't attach one sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functionality
customer_reviews.text: One must be very very careful when using this bidet as it has a lot of pressure and can wet an entire water closet. With that in mind, it cleans quite well. A less expensive alternative to a porcelain bidet.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Loving it so far!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second try at an add-on bidet. My first try, with a different brand did not work out. That unit was poorly made and leaked badly. The Boss Bidet was very easy to install once I got a new piece of flexible water supply line (mine was rigid pipe, so the bidet water diverter valve would not fit initially). Took about 20 minutes total. Works great. No leaks. Good pressure.
customer_reviews.author: RainRacer

customer_reviews.title: I like it. Took some time to install
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I like it. Took some time to install. Was not as easy as the directions claimed. The sprayers are powerful but getting the angle correct is a challenge. If it's not aimed at the proper angle, then you get sprayed between the toilet and the toilet seat. But..... overall it does a good job and the price was very reasonable! I live in Florida so the non-heated water is not an issue. Even if it were heated, you would have to wait for the hot water to come to the bidet. No electric, no plumbing. Great option.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh.
customer_reviews.text: What else can one say about a bidet, except, "Ahhh". Seriously. This is an awesome product for anyone that wants a bidet, but can't get one for any number of reasons. There are more expensive options out there, but for those that want an easy-to-do, do-it-yourself amenity, you can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Anlet

customer_reviews.title: Saving on toilet tissue
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality - very easy to install. Some folks may want hot water to mix, but I find just the cold water hookup to be fine, and it makes it MUCH easier to install. Simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: FLebel

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It works exactly as the company describes. I bought three and installed them in each bathroom. What I like about them is they complement the toilet and do not look gaudy, that’s if you actually see them. Not cumbersome and very easy to install. I am impressed also they provide you with a small roll of Teflon tape which is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Clean and efficient. Truly a game changer
customer_reviews.text: Took me a couple of hours to install. Mostly due to my incompetence ( Read the directions first) and problems with my toilet plumbing and toilet seat. Once I finally got it installed it works great. My wife has already thanked me several times. I cannot speak to durability, since I just received it. From what I see so far,I will definitely recommend it to my family and friends. A really good product.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore G.

customer_reviews.title: Update:  one of two developed a leak.  Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works as advertised. I have two of these bidets. My second and newer one developed a leak inside the lever mechanism. Sadly I had to remove it. The first and older one is still working like a champ. Knocking down two stars for the 50% defective.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: A great way to upgrade your bathroom.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted a bidet in my home for a long time and thought I didn't have the space. This works! Not only for the limited space but the function of a bidet. It was super easy to install too.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Dancer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, and ready to buy another one for my 2nd bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with my Boss Bidet and plan on buying one for every bathroom soon. The whole family loves the fresh and clean feeling in seconds. This was so easy to install. It took us about 15 minutes. My worries before the purchase was it the water temperature being too cool. The feeling is a little shocking at first but once you know what to expect it's no big deal. Every bathroom should have one! I was also hesitant about the Gold bidet but I’m glad I got it. Looks great in the picture and way better in person!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The ease of installing and the stylish look.
customer_reviews.text: This bidet is just what we wanted!! We are a couple in our early 70s with the usual aches and pains. The bidet stops the toilet seat shuffle, with comfort "the task at hand" is completed.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Sadly a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this with high hopes and loved it for the first year. Since then I have battled leaks around the inlet threads. Finally the leak is so bad I cannot make it stop leaking. No one has been hard on this. It was in a private bath that only my wife and I use. It's a shame because the product was great otherwise. Now just a big disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Charles S Price

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one. Different manufacturer. I wish I'd kept my first one. This one is cheaply made and of course more expensive. The connector on the bidet is cheap plastic and leaks. The "aim" is way off and not able to be adjusted. Dont bother.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy N.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until a leak happened
customer_reviews.text: So first off, I absolutely love this product, it's a bidet that doesn't require any electricity so don't have to call in a contractor, what's not to love. It leaves one feeling clean after doing your business just like the more expensive Toto stuff. Now admittedly it would be a five star review but after only a few months mine had started springing multiple leaks, so it had to be retired.
customer_reviews.author: Yuma Towns

customer_reviews.title: How to explain how wonderful this attachment is
customer_reviews.text: Oh my! How to explain how wonderful this attachment is? I have talked to so many people about a bidet attachment and after purchasing one and even two my friends effusively thank me. Most comments are, "Why didn't someone tell me about this years ago?" Two prominent comments are about the infrequent purchase of toilet paper and how they are protecting the septic tank. Who would have thunk, right?
customer_reviews.author: Gran Majestad

customer_reviews.title: Every Toilet Should Have One
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and has been working perfectly. Takes several times to get used to, especially the cold water(!), but I now want this installed at work. Haha. Some have said that they save on TP, but if you dry yourself well, it's probably a wash, pun intended.
customer_reviews.author: icopus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Works well but started leaking from the control unit within couple of days. Very disappointed. Update: Received replacement from the company soon i posted my review. 4 stars just for excellent customer service. Will try out the replacement in next few days and update this review as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Piyush Sinha

customer_reviews.title: Great bidet at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, no extra gap on our Kohler oblong toilet seat, seat locked in tight. Easy to use, of the three we ya e bought this one is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and excellent fit & finish!
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy installation. Engineered to adjusts to various types of toilet seat types. Quality hardware included. In my opinion an all around quality product that is easy to install and operate. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Keep you cleaner and feeling fresher. Easy to care for.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool product. It squirts a stream of water at your behind when you need to clean. It reduces the number of times you must wipe. You get up feeling cleaner and refreshed. We installed them on all our toilets. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: John Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This has made life so much easier and cleaner. I made a good decision here.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Behel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Performs great. I had difficulty with the installation due to small working space, and with lining up the threads. It actually took me 2 days to install, but that was my fault and frustration.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond A.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: The product works exactly like it describes. The downside is it doesn’t have a Heated tank or heated water. The jet on it does not oscillate so you have to move around on the seat to clear the mud gate. Minor problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steve W.

customer_reviews.title: Replacing toilet paper.
customer_reviews.text: I cut my toilet paper use by around 90% .Works great and the cold water spray isn't bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Elrabin

customer_reviews.title: Good bidet attachment.
customer_reviews.text: Good basic bidet attachment. Pressure is good and it is easy to use. Definitely get some toilet seat bumpers to level it out after installing.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Feel cleaner than ever
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, helpful, not too cold, not perfect stream, but good. Be careful not to test spray standing up. If you do, use a towel.
customer_reviews.author: Deb H

customer_reviews.title: Write down the serial Number!
customer_reviews.text: I never thought of buying a Bidet until now because of having surgery and thought it might help me! Well let me tell you when I first use it I thought WOW this is Wonderful! I just Love it and wish I had bought it Years ago! My only suggestion is before you install it make sure you write down the serial #! I did not and had a hard time reading the numbers to put on the warranty form!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Church

customer_reviews.title: Lovely idea not good for me
customer_reviews.text: It good for women as it contributes to bladder. Infection and not good for tall people as it pressed against tail bone
customer_reviews.author: Judith   B. Roepke

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Install
customer_reviews.text: Bought this attractive, easy-to-install bidet for my attractive, not so easy-to-please wife. She sits, it squirts, she's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence E. Miles

customer_reviews.title: insufficient instructions
customer_reviews.text: It was not easy to set this up. it took quite some tries to get it right. The instructions that it came with are way not sufficient. After it is set up right it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: jaybee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: I often get accused of treating certain subjects indelicately so I am not go into any details other than to say: Easy to install. Nice looking, solid construction. As to performance, I will quote my wife and the person that would censor me: "This is the best thing that we have ever bought".
customer_reviews.author: Brenda D. Shapard

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just overall a well made product. Sturdy and great for hygiene. My wife absolutely loves it as do I. After using this item not using a bidet now feels savage lol.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Peker

customer_reviews.title: Our first Boss Bidet attachment, and both me and my wife love it!
customer_reviews.text: After coming back from our trip to Europe, we were set on buying a bidet for our bathroom. We wanted something nice and high quality so decided on the Boss Bidet! We’re very happy with our decision! It cleans us up nice 😉 and has saved us a a lot of money on toilet paper! It pays for itself. Installation took less than 20 minutes. Just make sure you tighten all connections so it doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amjed S. Dweik

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bidet. It works great. I have had a similar one which was not as good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This Bidet works well and cleans better than the wet wipes. I would totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Conscious consumer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: It is very bad product, water comes from below, from an small opening in the middle and now the water is flushing without switching on, Please help me in return back this product
customer_reviews.author: Ayman M

customer_reviews.title: How to set it for your individual useL.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best ever for minimizing infection for some one who has had Rectal Cancer with Radiation,,,,, And for someone who has a Pessary for uterus and Bladder prolapse... This is a MUST.,,,, What I don’t like is no instructions for use came with it,,,only instructions fore installations,,,,,, What to use and not to use for cleaning?
customer_reviews.author: coco

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to Install. Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it is supposed to do. Wish I had purchased long ago. Get one, you’ll be glad and will save on that hard to find toilet paper
customer_reviews.author: Steven Clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have installed two of these, individually it took less than 15 minutes. I have had no issues with this product thus far, just make sure you have it aligned correctly during installation.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Z.

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Great product. First, the installation was very easy, everything was included in the package and the instructions sheet was very convenient to follow. No Plummer needed. Water flow and pressure are just right, no too strong and not too weak. Very elegant look and the gear-type valve very pleasing to use.
customer_reviews.author: Raffie Garabedian

customer_reviews.title: Easy install. Functions as expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy install. Functions as expected. Can't tell a real big difference between front and back nozzles but overall very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Ace44

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says it will
customer_reviews.text: Just received my Boss Bidet a couple of days ago. My husband put it on our tolit with no problems. The Bidet has been wonderful, it works just like it should. I'm very happy with my purchase and the way it does it's job. So happy that I bought the Biss Bidet. Connie
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Both my husband and I have traveled in many countries where a bidet is used and since we both have trouble with reaction to the toilet papers on the market, the bidet was a perfect solution. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Postma

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: This product is pretty great but there is a fine line between hitting the sac and a bazooka of water hitting your back door.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: I did quite a bit of research and determined that the Boss Bidet Bold Toilet Attachment was the best among competing products
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing this item, I did quite a bit of research and determined that the Boss Bidet Bold Toilet Attachment was the best among competing products. I like the pull/push knob to activate the bidet and to control pressure, the positive click of the nozzle choice dial and, of course, the sleek and pleasing design of the unit. Installation was a breeze -- I am a 74 year old woman and managed to install the bidet in about 20 minutes. There were no leaks after firmly hand-tightening the fittings. The bidet functions exactly as described by the seller. I am very happy that I bought it and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: I. W.

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised,and very happy.
customer_reviews.text: This a little more expensive than some,but all in all,happy with the purchase,Installation was easy ,only required a screw driver ,and two wrenches.Teflon tape was included in the kit.Instructions were straight forward and simple.Although I have only used twice I am happy and pleased with the whole process.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Labella

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job.
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. But it feels super plasticy and cheap. I think if you’re careful with it, it should last a year or two! It’s worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Easy Peezy to install!
customer_reviews.text: Boss Bidet Bold was very easy to install, took about 15 minutes. It came with everything I needed to do the installation. All you need to supply is a screw driver to remove the toilet seat, and a pair of pliers to gently tighten the couplings. Works GREAT! Both my wife and I like it, and the way it works.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Fetterman

customer_reviews.title: Very affordable, practical, effective little bidet
customer_reviews.text: Very affordable very practical very effective little bidet. Remember to use Teflon tape when installing.
customer_reviews.author: D. Winslow

customer_reviews.title: Sets in any type of toilet
customer_reviews.text: It’s about time to use water for clean up . It’s feels good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LEAKS!
customer_reviews.text: Great idea however water leaks from below the plastic control panel. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product was very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to install! I wish I knew that the seat and lid would be slightly elevated after installing... this left me puzzled for a bit, but otherwise I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: jcraine

customer_reviews.title: Fantasric
customer_reviews.text: It is even better than I had hoped. Cleans thoroughly and comfortably. I could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: T. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long to know this existed> Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: okay game, fun to play while waiting

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice design. I prefer this one because of the front and back adjustment knob. Very handy. Looks inconspicuous and less like a clinical device.
customer_reviews.author: noonykins

customer_reviews.title: It has all the right features, would be ideal, but it leaks.
customer_reviews.text: The leak is not from any of the connections which I have tightened, retightened and replaced, etc. It has the tiniest little leak from the underside of the main knob unit which is insanely annoying. Otherwise, it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Butt buster is a better name!
customer_reviews.text: The adapter leaks. No matter what you do, it leaks! Spent 2 hours trying to adjust it and gave up.
customer_reviews.author: B in NC

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy plastic and overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This product may work well but it is very flimsy plastic and overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: so easy to install, works great, worth every penny! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Roche

customer_reviews.title: it works great and every house should have it
customer_reviews.text: Growing up in Italy where every house has a bidet i always missed the same clean and fresh sensation of being perfectly clean after using the bathroom. Finally i can feel the same with Boss Bidet, it works great and every house should have it.
customer_reviews.author: filippo del vita

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Easy to install! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was very interested in getting this product. I was a little hesitant about getting it and installing it. I was very surprised at how easy it was to install and I’m very impressed with how great it works! I have to admit that, once again, my wife was right!
customer_reviews.author: Harry LeFevre

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to any toilet. Easy to install, no leaks, and solid construction.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great bathroom addition
customer_reviews.text: GreAt product. Easy to install. Easy to use. Leaves you feeling clean. Reduces the amount of toilet paper needed.
customer_reviews.author: Texas-T

customer_reviews.title: Average for the price range
customer_reviews.text: After minor fix I am pleased with it. Had a leak when using cleaning mode, water was getting back into the housing. added a little sealant around top side of water delivery spout, Need a better seal in that area
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my Boss Bidet. I’ve always wanted a bidet, and saw the attachment is an affordable and ideal installation setup. I watched the installation video on their website and clipped it onto my toilet in 15 minutes! The material and accessories are great quality. The white and gold give our bathroom a modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Installation was quick and use is even easier. In this time where toilet paper is scarce, the boss bidet is super useful!
customer_reviews.author: Ajknot9

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: It took a little while to get used to cold water spraying on me, but it is definitely worth it! I feel so much cleaner after a trip to the toilet. Will definitely have a bidet from now on!!!
customer_reviews.author: LeAnn Shiers

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to really pay attention to directions
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty metal parts which I was impressed. Easy enough to install but be sure to watch YouTube videos and get as much information as possible for troubleshooting!
customer_reviews.author: Vicenta Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Use the plumbers tape thats included for a nice seal on the pipes
customer_reviews.text: Installed this for our Master bath during the Covid19 toilet paper nonsense. Works great and easy to use and install. Wish that I bought one with electricity so the water would be warm but it still is a fantastic easy bidet.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M.

customer_reviews.title: Great idea for converting
customer_reviews.text: Great should ordered one sooner you will save so much T.P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product  High quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install Good quality fittings and hose Looks good and functions even bettrr
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johns

product_meta.title: Bidet Toilet Seat Attachment by BOSS | Fresh Water Sprayer | Cleans Your Rear Better Than You Can | Dual Nozzle | Self Cleaning | Manual | Non Electric | BOLD White & Gold | 1 Year Warranty
product_meta.description:
Toilet paper costs a lot of money and wiping your rear does not always remove the fecal matter left on your behind. The Boss Bidet BOLD toilet attachment is designed to provide a hands-free water cleansing for your bottom.



What is it?

The Boss Bidet Bold attaches to your toilet in 15 minutes and spray cleans your butt when you are finished using the bathroom.

How does it work?

1) By raising the lever, water sprays at the 'right spot' to give you a fresh shower clean feeling
2) Dry your butt with 1-2 sheets of toilet paper.
3) Walk away feeling shower clean.

Boss Bidet Bold Features:

Dual nozzles for front and rear cleaning.
Self-cleaning nozzle system.
Nozzles retract when not in use.
Universal Toilet Fit. Attaches to any standard two-piece toilet.
Adjustable round plates for a secure fit.

Comes with:

1 Year Warranty 
Stainless steel hose and Brass adaptor
Includes instruction manual and installation video on our website: www.BossBidet.com

Health Benefits:

Improves Rectal & Genital Hygiene
Improves Menstruation Cleansing
Assists Senior Citizen Mobility
Assists Disabled Individuals
Eases Cleansing for Pregnant Women
Hemorrhoids Pain and Itch Relief
Prevents Urinary Tract Infection (UTI)
Relieves Constipation

Details:

Environmentally Friendly
Non-Electric
feature_bullets: [ CLEANS YOUR REAR IN 1.3 SECONDS ] - Attach, Spray, Clean, Ahhhhh! Always feel fresh leaving the bathroom.
[ INSTALLS IN 15 MINUTES ] Anyone can easily install Boss Bidet by watching our installation video or reading our manual. No plumbing experience needed.
[ TWO CLEANING MODES ] - Boss has two main cleaning features. Rear Cleaning (for men and women) and Front Cleaning (women's privates)

[ SELF CLEANING NOZZLE ] - This feature is important because it ensures the nozzles remain free of residue before and after using the bidet. When turned on, water sprays and cleans the nozzles. The nozzles are also retract when not in use.

[ CONSUME LESS TOILET PAPER ] - The Boss Bidet pays for itself. With the Boss Bidet, you will reduce TP consumption by 63% (On Average). Less toilet paper = more money in your pocket and more trees on earth!
